Welcome to RPIXplore!

RPIXplore is a website developed by RPI students as part of the Rensselaer Community Open Source class. We aim to provide more information into what the dorms at RPI are like. Visit the dorms page to browse dorms of all grade levels, with details specifics about what each dorm provides.

Still have questions? Visit the forum and ask!

All members of the RPI community can feel free to ask and answer any questions they have.

Forum

Our forum is in the works! No more need to search through Reddit, Facebook, and Discord to find answers. Made for both parents and students alike.

Forum Coming Soon
Resources and FAQ

Our Resources section has any frequently asked questions for quick browsing of common information. Anything not found? Visit our forum and ask!

FAQ and Resources
Dorms

Explore, with RPI Xplore. Visit our dorm explore page and see all our dorm information to date. Why us? Made by students, our website has everything we believe you'll need.
